title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: In lieu with their recent survey soliciting interest in Bot Testnet, they have received over 1500+ response from the beloved community. Now it's time to earn some rewards based on your feedback on the Bot Testnet.You can simply follow the steps below to participate in the bounty to earn rewards.Read more here: https://medium.com/indracapital/the-airavat-cloud-wallet-part-ii-bounties-rewards-and-more-68b55beebf3b

comments.author: Frengki_cisco
comments.body: Quote from: sagarbansal21 on May 25, 2022, 05:01:37 AMIn lieu with their recent survey soliciting interest in Bot Testnet, they have received over 1500+ response from the beloved community. Now it's time to earn some rewards based on your feedback on the Bot Testnet.You can simply follow the steps below to participate in the bounty to earn rewards.Read more here: https://medium.com/indracapital/the-airavat-cloud-wallet-part-ii-bounties-rewards-and-more-68b55beebf3bNot a few companies that offer free gifts with the excuse of sending 0.005 BNB to claim the prize, of course what is offered by the Testnet Bot, something commonplace, but have you got it, show it here so we know the gift is not a scam.Not do not believe, the victim of fraud is currently increasing.

comments.author: tobi4255
comments.body: This campaign already ends and unfortunately I missed it. But recently I joined Oasis ambassador Program and it's ongoing. If you are a passionate crypto enthusiast and have much more time to get involved then you can apply for the ambassador program.
